listing.listing_description: Get your fill of modern architecture as you swim and barbecue at Eagle Retreat. This sleek residence elevates the classic A-frame home—almost literally—and fills it with pared-down furnishings for a chic backdrop to holiday snaps. While the yard feels private and the views are of bushland, it’s less than a 3 minute walk to the beach, shops, restaurants and more in downtown Casuarina. Slide open the retreat’s glass walls to reach the backyard and its freshwater plunge pool, lounging and dining areas, and gas barbecue. Cue up a favorite album on the Sonos sound system to set the mood as you fire up the grill or, after a day out at the beach, unwind with a glass of Australian wine in front of the smart TV and Wi-Fi. Eagle Retreat looks like an A-frame house set on top of a box, and the result is a double-height wall of glass that bathes the great room in light. Open the walls to feel the breeze as you stretch out on the sofa and whip up meals in the gleaming black and white kitchen, which is fully equipped, then serve friends and family at a dining table with banquette seating or the breakfast bar. This vacation rental has one bedroom with a king bed and en-suite bathroom, and 2 bedrooms with queen beds and access to a hall bathroom. It can accommodate six guests, or you can give yourself the luxury of having it all to yourself on a honeymoon-style getaway. With Casuarina Beach and Cabarita Beach just a 4-minute and a 6-minute drive from the house, respectively, you can watch the waves crash onto the sand on a sunrise stroll and be back for breakfast. Plan a canoe trip or walk in nearby Cudgen Nature Reserve or a round at Pottsville Golf Course, then reward yourself with dinner in Casuarina, only 6 minutes away by car. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Near to beautiful Berawa Beach on the magnificent island of Bali’s southern coast is the four-bedroom Saraswati at Dea. Named after the Hindu goddess of knowledge and art, Villa Saraswati aspires to invoke guests’ curiosity to experience the natural beauty and ancient culture of Bali. The villa can host up to eight lucky guests, all of whom will have the good fortune of being able to experience one of Indonesia’s most famous islands while immersed in both comfort and supreme style.A team of professional chefs, housekeepers and butlers will be looking after nearly everything so that guests may enjoy themselves. Villa Saraswati offers guests a delightful pétanque court as well as a game of chess with giant fairytale pieces found in the garden. There’s an inviting swimming pool to cool down, and bicycles are also provided for light excursions. The interior of the home boasts a deluxe media room, the latest in surround sound systems, as well as access to Wi-Fi.The living pavilion is tremendous in size and has the amazing option of remaining walled in, or to have the walls removed and have seamless access to the swimming pool and terrace. This pavilion also hosts the suar-wood dining table that can seat fourteen, surrounded by additional lounge furniture of cushioned wicker sofas and traditional Balinese artworks. Make sure to check out the espresso machine and wine fridge in the stylish open concept modern kitchen.Saraswati at Dea has four plush en-suite bedrooms, each with dressing areas and access to private gardens. Guests can choose between king size or two twin size beds and can completely relax in their rooms with a television for entertainment. The en-suite bathrooms are alfresco, though walled gardens ensure complete privacy.The Berawa Beach district has more to offer than just some of the world’s most sought-after surfing locations, it is located near plenty of first-class resorts and restaurants, while being deeply immersed in local culture. Try out the nearby Nirwana Bali Golf Course or visit the Kuta Theater. For a taste of Balinese fine dining, Jalan Kartika Plaza will astound taste buds with rare spices that are hard pressed to be found anywhere else in the world!Read more about this villa in our magazine (http://magazine.luxuryretreats.com/get-the-look-balinese-bedroom-ideas/)Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Find perfectly laid-back luxury at Villa Mannao. Set in a residential neighborhood with views of the Kerobokan rice fields, this expansive Bali vacation rental offers both a tranquil ambience and a location close to the beaches and attractions of Seminyak and Canggu. Its attentive staff will accommodate your needs, and its eight suite-style bedrooms can accommodate up to sixteen friends or extended family on holiday together.Your stay at the villa begins with an airport transfer upon arrival and includes the services of a housekeeper, cook, security and a gardener. Make the most of the tropical weather with two pools, and loungers in the sun and the shade of a bale, heating up the barbecue as the sun sinks toward the horizon. For evening entertainment, there’s a satellite TV, sound system, Wi-Fi and bar.Like many traditional Balinese estates, Villa Mannao is laid out over a series of pavilions set in a lush garden. At the heart of the property, you’ll find two open-sided living spaces that let in both the views and the warm breezes, which you can enjoy from a spot on one of the contemporary sofas or around a dining table that seats eighteen. Though cook service is included, the villa does have a fully equipped kitchen.The eight bedrooms at Villa Mannao are spread out between four separate buildings. Each one has a private en-suite bathroom and an al-fresco shower or bathtub. There are seven honeymoon-worthy suites with king beds, and one bedroom with two twin bunk beds that’s perfect for younger guests.Despite the villa’s serene setting, it’s only a 10-minute drive from popular beaches such as picturesque Batubelig and the relatively secluded Petitenget, as well as the attractions of Seminyak and Canggu. Find the perfect souvenir or satisfying snack in the shops and restaurants at Seminyak Square, seek thrills at the Finns Recreation Club and Waterbom Bali or spend a memorable night out in Kuta.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The stunning villa, recognised in Architectural Digest & Architecture Magazine for its spectacular design, is perfectly nestled into the natural landscape right on the shores of Lake Wanaka and is available on an exclusive-use basis for up to 14 guests, featuring 6 bedrooms and 6.5 bathrooms.You may never wish to leave the property. On over 330 acres of lakeside farmlands, thoughtfully planted with nearly 1 million native plants, you can enjoy a range of on-site experiences.If you wish to explore the local area, golf courses, wineries and water sports are nearby. The on site helipad also opens up access to Queenstown, Fiordland National Park, Milford Sound, Mt Aspiring National Park and the wild West Coast of New Zealand.Included in your stay at Piwakawaka Point is an on-site host, daily housekeeping, concierge service, luxury linen and bathroom amenities, general pantry provisions, a glass of Central Otago sparkling wine on arrival and fresh flowers.

listing.listing_description: This breathtaking villa is situated in the Tabanan Regency of southwestern Bali, steps from Pasut Beach. A visionary architectural masterpiece, the home consists of five elliptical forms fused into a cloud-like structure, with spacious living and dining areas and three deluxe bedroom suites. The villa is perched on a secure estate with a private swimming pool, beautiful lawns, and views of the Indian Ocean. Each of the bedrooms features a king bed and ensuite bathroom, ideal for multiple couples, destination wedding guests, or a family. Your vacation rental includes complimentary manager, butler, and housekeeping services, with multiple premium options available.The lush estate offers an enchanting venue for special occasions or serene relaxation. The swimming pool echoes the shape of the home's front facade, with ample room to play and bathe. Elegant lounge chairs arrayed on the terrace beckon you into the exquisite light, while the sprawling lawns extend toward coastal rice paddies and the vast ocean.The interiors feature a superb open kitchen flanked by a living room and dining room. Large glass walls open to the pool, infusing the home with an alfresco ambiance. Luminous white surfaces accentuate the artful décor of teak, onyx, petrified wood, and exposed rock. The sleek kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances and a lovely marble breakfast bar. The lounge area features superb furnishings, a high-end TV, and an elegant chess table, while the gorgeous dining table seats twelve beneath flower-like lamps.A floating staircase forms the threshold into the dining room and ascends to the master suite: the apex of the home. The suite features a lovely in-room tub in addition to an ensuite bathroom with rain shower. The two guest suites are on the garden level, facing away from the pool. Each features an ensuite bathroom with rain shower opening to a stone tub on a private patio. Like the living areas, the bedrooms are furnished with a minimalist elegance, including beautiful, naturalistic objects and original artwork.From this private retreat at Pasut Beach, you're just short drive to Abian Kapas Beach and less than twenty kilometers to Tanah Lot Temple and Nirwana Bali Golf Club. The famed beaches and nightlife at Seminyak are about thirty kilometers away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Relax in the pool beneath turquoise Bodhisattvas, gather for privately catered meals, and venture out for a night in nearby Seminyak. Part of a complex of 3 distinct homes at Villa Zenissima Estate, this vacation rental enjoys a private swimming pool and expansive living/dining area with gourmet kitchen, as well as a superb staff. Adventures and activities abound in every direction, from the famed surf breaks of Kuta Beach to the colorful splendors of Bali Bird Park.The villa’s high walls and 2-story main house create a cloistered setting for private parties or serene relaxation. Sunbathe on semi-submerged lounge chairs before plunging into the sparkling water. Spend the balmy afternoon on the shaded bed, and host a cocktail party under the enchanting evening sky. The expansive entertainment area with open kitchen is perfect for festive parties or intimate gatherings. At night, retreat into one of the villa’s 4 king bedroom suites, featuring stunning artwork and direct access to the pool terrace or a private balcony.The villa is ideally placed within easy driving distance of some of the finest beaches in Bali, including Petitenget, Echo, Seminyak, and Kuta. Enjoy a delicious cup of coffee at Revolver in Seminyak, and sunset drinks at the beachfront Ku De Ta restaurant. Take the family to Finn’s Recreation Club for water slides, bowling, and tennis, or explore the island’s precious local culture with a visit to Tanah Lot Temple.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Metallic frames outline colorful artwork while floor-to-ceiling glass frames bird’s-eye views of the Melbourne skyline at this sleek penthouse. Set behind the gold-tinted windows at the top of the Zen Tower and laid out around an open-plan great room, this urban nest is a gallery-like hideaway above downtown. Take a walking tour or shop on your own at Queen Victoria Market, 5 minutes away.Your holiday begins with a personal welcome and gourmet basket, and an on-call concierge can answer questions during your stay. Stretch out in front of the Apple TV or check in via Wi-Fi at the end of a day exploring the city; use the tower’s shared indoor swimming pool, hot tub, sauna, and gym; or request to volley with friends and family on the shared tennis court.Boldly patterned area rugs divide the great room into a living area, lounging area, dining area for eight, and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar. A sumptuous leather sectional and lounge chairs invite you to settle in, while an oversized flower print above the dining table brings a little bit of the garden into your perch high above the ground.This vacation rental has a master suite with a king bed, private en-suite bathroom, and city views. A glass wall separates the bedroom area from the stand-alone bathtub, giving you the luxury of taking in the skyline as you soak. The other two bedrooms each have a queen bed and access to a hall bathroom.Zen Tower is a 5-minute walk from Queen Victoria Market, where you can take a walking—and tasting—tour, pick up fresh ingredients for a meal, or catch a busker performance, and the photogenic exterior (plus transit hub) of Melbourne Central Railway Station. Delve into Australia’s history at the Immigration Museum and natural history at the Melbourne Museum. And pop into the city’s laneways to discover everything from coffee spots to honeymoon-worthy restaurants to street art. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note: This home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.Take a holiday on a grand scale at Villa Mary. One of the most expansive and private residences on the grounds of Bali’s exclusive Pantai Lima estate, this gorgeous vacation rental offers views as far as the ocean and rice fields. Attentive service, access to shared amenities and five bedrooms make for an atmosphere of welcoming luxury for up to ten guests.Your stay at Pantai Lima includes the services of a cook, property manager, butler, housekeeper and driver. Guests of Villa Mary are welcome at the estate’s shared tennis court and fitness center, and the villa has its own outdoor living spaces with areas for sitting, dining and lounging; a palm-tree-lined pool and hot tub; and views of the Indian Ocean.Enjoy the tropical weather from open-sided pavilions or cool off in the indoor living and dining areas; serene water features link the two. Sleek furnishings and natural textures—think wire dining chairs with a live-edge table—are fresh and modern. For entertainment, there’s a spacious home theater, sound system and Wi-Fi.Villa Mary has four bedrooms with queen beds, en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning, as well as a terrace or balcony. The fifth bedroom has two twin beds and air conditioning, and adjoins the master suite, making it perfect for a family traveling with younger children.With its out-of-a-postcard beaches and bohemian vibe, Bali appeals to everyone from backpackers to honeymooners. Embrace its laid-back ambience with a walk to the nearest beach on the villa’s private path or a short drive to Seminyak Beach, the closest swimmable stretch. Bring kids to the Canggu Club and chase thrills on the waterslides, or book a tee time at Nirwana Bali Golf Course and go after your best score.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: From the Frankton Arm of Lake Wakatipu, this luxurious five bedroom villa uses floor-to-ceiling windows to deliver panoramic views of the lake, the Remarkables mountain range, and Queenstown. Within a few minute’s drive, you’ll find golf, skiing, sandy beachfront, and Queenstown’s bustling nightlife. Shimmerlake is located in the prestigious community of Kelvin Heights, about fifteen kilometers from Queenstown, making it an ideal setting for those who appreciate privacy as well as proximity.Making the most of its lake and mountain-side location, Shimmerlake’s open concept living room stretches wide rather than deep, giving the dining area, kitchen, and fireplace lounge equal opportunity to capture the amazing scenery. Sleek architecture gives Shimmerlake a futuristic feel, while modern-retro furnishings add stylish warmth and comfort to the interior decor. A separate media room supplies guests with a more casual setting to relax and enjoy a movie night with the family. And, the master bedroom comes with an en-suite bathroom, king-sized bed, walk-in closet, and lake and mountain views.Dining in? Shimmerlake is the perfect host for a special evening with friends and family. There’s garage parking for one, and space for three more vehicles in the driveway. Inside, the fully equipped kitchen makes meal prep a breeze, and the formal dining area has a beautiful mountain view and seating for ten. Outside, you’ll love the casual atmosphere of the alfresco dining set and barbecue. And, you’ll surely appreciate Shimmerlake’s Wi-Fi, sound system, and television.The dramatic landscapes of New Zealand offer incredible hiking and walking trails, many of which are accessible from Shimmerlake in a matter of minutes. Jardine Park and the Franklin Recreational Reserve are both great places to start your exploration. Golf is another way to get out and enjoy the view, and Queenstown is home to a few World-class courses, like Jack’s Point. After your round, stop into Jack’s Point Restaurant for a late lunch, they have an amazing menu full of locally sourced ingredients, and breathtaking mountain views.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Anandita means ‘bringer of happiness’ in the ancient language of Sanskrit, and this beachside haven located in fabulous Lombok is sure to bring its fortunate guests just that. A series of single-story living and sleeping pavilions leisurely spread throughout an enormous plot of lush green lawns planted with towering coconut palms compose this delightful tropical retreat. Get the rest and relaxation you deserve in this magical area of Indonesia!Guests will be spoiled for choice when it comes to planning their days. Will it be a swim in the spectacular pool complete with waterfall feature and Jacuzzi or beachcombing and kayaking on beautiful Sira Beach. Or perhaps an energetic game of soccer or volleyball? Those seeking more languid pursuits can plug in their iPods and chill out with some choice tunes, watch a movie on the large screen satellite television with DVD player or socialize over a game of billiards in the living pavilion.The kitchen at Anandita is cleverly divided for either guest or staff use. The villa’s cook is expertly skilled at preparing a wide range of delicious local and international dishes – anything from formal dinners in the dining pavilion, to a romantic supper beside the beach, to a casual poolside barbecue. The interiors are somehow minimalistic, yet regal – an ideal environment for meditation and rejuvenation. The open plan concept as well as high vaulted ceilings keep the feelings airy and breezy throughout the gorgeous pavilions.Each of the four en-suite bedrooms is housed in a private pavilion in the gardens. King size beds and convertible daybeds make these rooms very family-friendly. All of the suites feature air conditioning, media units and stunning beach views. Fine linens and top quality beddings provide soothing nights of well deserved rest.As well as taking care of Anandita itself, a team of friendly, thoughtful staff will happily entertain guests of all ages, creating coconut leaf toys and decorations with the children, making up numbers for volleyball games, or turning tour guide for those who would like to explore further afield – made even easier courtesy of the services of a car and driver included with your reservation. Bask in the weather, water, good food and good people this year in lovely Indonesia!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Soham is a spectacular villa on the southern tip of Bali's Bukit Peninsula. One of two luxury villas within the Sohamsa Ocean Estate (along with neighboring Villa Hamsa), this five-bedroom home is perched on a cliff above the waves, with panoramic views of the Indian Ocean. The villa blends contemporary design concepts and high-end amenities with traditional Balinese materials, structures, and artwork, creating an environment at once timeless and utterly comfortable. Resort-like wellness facilities include a massage room, gym, sauna, and steam room, while professional staff include chef services, housekeeping, nighttime security, and a villa manager.Savor dreamy hours by the ample pool running the length of the house, dipping into its refreshing waters and sunbathing on elegant loungers oriented toward the sea. Relish alfresco meals fresh from the barbeque grill, and gather in the furnished pavilion for sunset cocktails. An interior living and dining room features glass doors opening to the ocean breeze, lending a lovely open-air feel to your dinners and nighttime gatherings.Each of the five bedroom suites features a king bed (four of which can be converted to pairs of twin beds), an ensuite bathroom, air conditioning, a ceiling fan, and a TV. Both the master suite and the primary guest suite open to the terrace and enjoy stunning ocean views, while their bathrooms include tubs and alfresco showers.While seemingly poised at the edge of the world, Villa Soham enjoys convenient proximity to some of the finest destinations in southern Bali. You're a few minutes from Pandawa Beach and an easy drive to Nusa Dua and Jimbaran Beach, while golfers are just eleven kilometers from New Kuta Golf. The resort and watersport destination of Tanjung Benoa is less than fourteen kilometers away, as is the iconic Uluwata Sea Temple. Less than eighteen kilometers to Ngurah Rai International Airport, the villa is a convenient choice for destination wedding guests.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Arranged in the "compound-style" of traditional Balinese homes, Villa Cemara is made up of a series of alang-alang thatched pavilions connected by garden walkways and serene outdoor living spaces. From the front gate to private beachfront-gate, Cemara is an authentically decorated open-air oasis that will truly immerse you, and up to nine more guests, in the Balinese way of life.At Cemara, privacy is provided by lush greenery and tall palm trees. While you navigate your way through the tranquil compound, you're sure to appreciate the finely crafted decor. Local materials like Palimanan and terrazzo flooring, natural stone, intricate carvings, and original works of art adorn the interior spaces. Each bedroom features a king-sized bed, en-suite bathroom, television, and air conditioning. The kitchen is fully-equipped with high-end appliances, formal dining for ten, and there's a private chef included with your reservation. There's a barbecue outside as well, great for cooking up something fresh from a local market.Spend your days enjoying endless ocean views from the terrace and beachfront. Soak up the sun from a lounge chair by the swimming pool. Relax and unwind as you breathe in the fresh ocean breeze, feel the warm Bali sun, and listen to the sounds of waves gently caressing the sandy shores. Should you desire to stay connected to the modern world, Cemara is outfitted with satellite television and Wi-Fi. And, to make life even easier, Cemara has a housekeeper, villa manager, a service staff, and security.If you're into long walks on the beach, Cemara has a bonus for you. Just outside your beachfront-gate, there's an eight-kilometer-long promenade great beach-cafes, and Watersport centers. And, just one kilometer away, you'll find shops, bars, and restaurants in Sanur. If you're traveling with a golf Aficionado, Bali Beach Golf Course is a beautifully scenic course running alongside the ocean, and it's under five kilometers from Cemara.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Relax in a sublime setting at Villa Cantik Pandawa. This gorgeous Bali vacation rental near Pandawa Beach, whose name translates to “beautiful,” lives up to that promise with panoramic ocean views, well-designed outdoor living areas and multi-level spaces for entertaining and unwinding. Invite up to twelve friends or family members to your very own tropical paradise.During your holiday at Villa Cantik, five butlers will wait on you (and cook for you) and a knowledgeable villa manager can answer any questions. Lounge in the sunshine by the upper-level infinity pool, which spills over into a second pool adjoining an open-sided bar, games room and dining area with seating for twenty. Other villa amenities include an exercise room and dedicated massage space.With more than 18,000 square feet of living space, this luxury property has plenty of room for both socializing and relaxing in private. Steal away to tranquil corners like the garden gazebo or the water features in the entryway or gather the whole group in an open-concept great room with sitting and dining areas and a fully equipped kitchen. The classic Balinese vaulted ceiling and a row of glass doors connect the space to the terrace for a seamless indoor-outdoor living area.Each of the six bedrooms at Villa Cantik has a king bed and en-suite bathroom. The master bedroom also has honeymoon-suite-worthy features like an al-fresco shower and a balcony overlooking the ocean, and several other bedrooms open to either a balcony or terrace.A location on the Bukit Peninsula at the southern tip of Bali makes Villa Cantik Pandawa feel delightfully far away from it all. But in spite of its peaceful, secluded setting, the property is only a 10-minute walk from the white-sand Pandawa Beach and a short drive from the Pandawa Beach Country Club. Don’t miss a show depicting traditional life at the nearby Nusa Dua Theater or a sunset dance performance at the striking Uluwatu temple.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Postcard-perfect views are framed by chic contemporary architecture at Lakefront Luxury. Set in the hills above Queenstown, this thoughtfully designed, recently built vacation rental boasts sweeping panoramas of Lake Wakatipu and the mountains beyond. Its four bedrooms are ideal for a golf getaway with friends or a ski holiday with family.Start the day with a morning coffee or a leisurely soak on the villa’s private north-facing deck, which has an al-fresco dining table and hot tub, then read or relax on the front balcony, which has glass railings for uninterrupted lake and mountain views. Heat up the barbecue and linger outside into the evening, or unwind inside in the media room, which has Sky TV, a sound system and Wi-Fi.The split-level design of Lakefront Luxury takes full advantage of its spectacular setting. On the top floor, you’ll find an open-concept space with two living areas separated by a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar and formal dining area. The room is flooded with light from nearly wall-to-wall windows, and even the fireplace is low-profile so as not to break up the vistas outside.All four of the villa’s bedrooms have king beds, en-suite bathrooms, and views of the lake and mountains, and open to a private balcony. All except one of the king beds can be split into two twin beds if desired.At only a 10-minute drive from the Queenstown airport, Lakefront Luxury puts you close to South Island adventure. It’s a 15-minute drive to the nearest ski area, at Coronet Peak, and an even shorter drive to your choice of two golf courses. For shopping, dining, nightlife or even a honeymoon-worthy cruise on the lake, make the 15-minute walk into central Queenstown.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Don’t be afraid to unleash your wild side at this serene Balinese villa on the northern Kuta coast. Sip tea next to the koi pond while you catch up on some reading. Let the full-staff cater to your every whim. When you’re ready to party, turn up the karaoke machine in the lounge bar or swim-up for a drink at the pool. Later, move the group to Seminyak’s beachfront nightclub scene.Villa Elite Tara mixes airy, traditional Balinese architecture with cutting-edge contemporary design to create a space that celebrates luxury and Bali’s natural surroundings. Warm woods and vibrant textures deliver a comfortable setting for socializing, while elements like the gardens, koi pond, and swimming pool all offer serenity. After an alfresco dinner prepared by a private chef, keep the festivities going in the spacious outdoor lounge or hang out at the bar inside.Known for its appearance in the film “Eat, Pray, Love,” Padang Padang Beach is one of Bali’s finest secluded coves. Protected by cliffs and coral, it feels delightfully cut-off from the rest of the world. It is also a perfect opportunity to rent a surfboard and sign-up for a one-time surfing lesson right on the beachfront. After a day on the beach, take your camera to Tanah Lot Sea Temple and see if you can snap a few pictures at sunset. The view is incredible.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Shambala is a hidden oasis – sophisticated, secluded and exclusive, yet located in the heart of bustling and fashionable Seminyak.With five elegant ensuite bedrooms – three of them in a privately situated guesthouse – a 19-metre swimming pool, a yoga garden and a spa room, Villa Shambala blends the charm of traditional Indonesian architecture with the luxury and comfort of modern conveniences and interiors. Thoughtful use of space makes this charismatic villa the perfect choice for large groups or families sharing, and a team of friendly staff is dedicated to meeting your every need.For a central-Seminyak property, Villa Shambala is exceptionally spacious, amazingly peaceful and totally charming. Set within a private walled garden, Shambala effortlessly fuses old and new, borrowing its eclectic style from the intricately carved traditional wooden joglo houses of Java, and blending it with today’s requisite comforts.Villa Shambala’s master suite features an exquisitely carved joglo canopy above the bed and a huge ensuite garden bathroom. The master and second bedroom sit beyond the living areas, to the rear of the villa, and both overlook a peaceful water feature complete with large stone Buddha and tranquil lily pond. The three guesthouse bedrooms, all ensuite, are arranged around a second television room, brightly decorated and perfect for children. Villa Shambala features a fully equipped media room complete with large screen projector, surround sound system, DVD and satellite television with an extensive library of DVDs, CDs and books for guests’ enjoyment. WiFi is also available throughout the villa.Leading away from the main building, past circular outdoor lounge seating under a shady ‘sail’ canopy, is a double spa room where guests can enjoy massage and Ayurvedic treatments administered by skilled therapists.Guests at Villa Shambala are served by a wonderful team of staff including a house manager, private chef, housekeepers, butler, gardeners and security guards, all dedicated to ensuring that you have the perfect holiday.Villa Shambala enjoys one of the most sought-after locations in Bali, offering guests a complete hidden paradise in Seminyak’s ‘Golden Triangle’. Guests are just minutes from Seminyak’s main street, Jalan Kayu Aya (also called Jalan Laksmana, Oberoi or ‘Eat Street’), where an impressive array of dining and entertainment options abound. Trendy boutiques, supermarkets and ATMs are all within a short walk of the villa, as are some of the island’s best known entertainment and dining venues, such as Ku De Ta, W Hotel, La Lucciola, Potatohead beach club and other glamorous Seminyak staples. Villa Shambala is also just 500 metres from the beach, where guests can enjoy a variety of water sports, long seaside walks and beautiful Bali sunsets.

listing.listing_description: Delight in a quintessential Bali welcome at The Rose. Part of the oceanfront Pandawa Cliff Estate community, this stunning luxury property boasts water views, a full staff and a location close to beaches, dining, nightlife and more. Reserve its four bedrooms for a tropical holiday with friends or book its sister villa, The Pala, and host a family reunion or destination wedding.Your stay at The Rose includes the services of a private chef, butler, housekeeper and driver. Get your fill of sunshine in outdoor living areas with an infinity pool, lounging and dining spaces, and a barbecue, or sneak off to the garden with a book. If you’ll be entertaining, a bar area and a media room with satellite television and a sound system make it a snap.The thoughtful design of this contemporary vacation rental lets you decide whether to savor open-air living or flip on the air conditioning. Sliding glass doors connect the open-concept living and dining areas to the terrace, and details like polished stone floors and wicker furniture add to the breezy ambience. While there is a fully equipped kitchen, the chef will take care of breakfast, and you can select other meals from a menu.The villa has two master suites with king beds, including one with a honeymoon-worthy al-fresco shower, and two bedrooms with two twin beds each. All four bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and open to an outdoor space, whether a terrace or balcony.Guests of The Rose are welcome to use the shared exercise room, spa, and tennis and squash courts at the Pandawa Cliff Estate during your stay. If you’d like to explore the surrounding Bukit area, make the short drive to nearby Pandawa Beach, sample restaurants and nightlife in the town of Nusa Dua, tee off at the New Kuta Golf Club and marvel at the sea temple at Uluwatu.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note that this home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.Set amongst the foothills of The Remarkables, Kahua Villa enjoys sweeping mountain views from its four-bedroom, modern farmhouse atmosphere. Located in Jack’s Point, Kahua offers its guests quick and easy access to the bustling city of Queenstown, while celebrating the privacy of its rural environment. Nearby, you’ll find Jack’s Point Golf Course. And, if you’re in New Zealand to ski, The Remarkables and Coronet Peak are both within a half hour’s drive. If you appreciate the marriage between country living and modern luxury, Kahua Villa is the perfect home base for your next Luxury Retreat.Just like its mountainous surroundings, Kahua Villa enjoys an airy-atmosphere, peaked ceilings, and soaring views. The living room stretches back the entire depth of the villa, flowing into the formal dining space, and kitchen. With floor-to-ceiling windows, a grand fireplace, and leather sofas, you’re sure to feel the inviting warmth of a classic ski chalet, yet Kahua’s stylish-contemporary spin adds a luxurious elegance to the equation. Connecting the television lounge and an extensive wine collection, you’ll find a pair of beautiful sliding barn doors. Moving on, Kahua’s terrace has the perfect setting for an alfresco dinner, with The Remarkables providing an unbeatable background.Kahua Villa comes with a fully equipped kitchen, air conditioning, Wi-Fi, and lots more. All four bedrooms feature king or split-king sized beds. The Master Bedroom enjoys a walk-in closet and its own private terrace with outdoor furniture. And, the fourth bedroom is located in a separate unit with an en-suite bathroom and kitchenette, making it easy for guests who desire a little extra privacy.Aside from skiing and golf, sailing is a great way to get out and have fun while enjoying the beautiful environment of Queenstown, and Wakatipu Yacht Club is the perfect place to inquire about lessons, tours, and rentals. If there’s a thrill seeker in your group, New Zealand is well-known as a haven for adventure tourists, with everything from jet boating to canyon swinging, skydiving, rock climbing, and everything in between. If you’re in the mood for exciting city life, Queenstown is just twenty minutes from home.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Sunbathe by the infinity pool, descend the stairs to Clontarf Beach, and lounge on the veranda with 180-degree views of Middle Harbor. This contemporary villa near Sydney balances sophisticated artistry, high-end technology, and kid-friendly features including a rumpus room and outdoor trampoline. Walk to the marina to set sail on the harbor or play a round at nearby Manly Golf Club.Outdoor living areas on all 4 levels emphasize the open-air delights of the Northern Beaches. On the main level, the wrap-around veranda boasts panoramic harbor views and a pergola-style cover with retractable canopy. The pool terrace extends from the lower level of the home (off the guest bedrooms), accompanied by a trampoline in the yard and a staircase leading down to the beach.The open-concept interior features a cozy lounge area with TV and fireplace, a chef-grade kitchen with breakfast bar, and a luminous dining area for 8. Sliding glass doors create a breezy, semi-alfresco ambiance, while central air conditioning keeps you cool when necessary. The décor is a harmony of natural wood, earthy leather accents, and soothing, sea-inspired blues, deftly enhanced by designer light fixtures and gallery-worthy artwork.An elevator complements the beautiful floating staircase between levels. On the upper floor, the master and primary guest suites enjoy ensuite bathrooms and private balconies with harbor views. The master additionally enjoys a private lounge, and its bathroom includes a soaking tub. Two kid-friendly guestrooms are on the pool level, sharing a bathroom and playroom with TV.In addition to Clontarf Beach beneath you, you’re within minutes by car of Castle Rock Beach, and a short stroll from Clontarf Marina. Walking and biking trails abound in the area, and you’re an easy drive from Mosman Village, Taronga Zoo, and Balgowlah.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: A glass of New Zealand wine, a sunset, and the mountain views from Karamata, and your worries won’t be able to stick around. The drama of Lake Wakatipu and the peaks of The Remarkables fills almost every room of this alpine-inspired townhouse. When you’re ready for outdoor adventure—or just dinner at a waterfront restaurant—it’s only a 10-minute downhill walk into central Queenstown. On sunny days, watch the light sparkle on the lake from a lounger on the villa’s terrace or balcony. In cooler weather, or after a day out in the mountains, leave gear in the ski storage area, flip on the gas fireplace and heated floors, and cozy up to the satellite TV, Sonos sound system, and Wi-Fi. A stone fireplace surround anchors the L-shaped great room at this vacation rental, where the living and dining areas face Queenstown, the lake, and the mountains, and the fully equipped kitchen has its own views from behind the dining area. The cream and brown color scheme is perked up by red upholstery and artwork around the dining table. This luxury property has 2 bedrooms with king beds and en-suite bathrooms, and an especially private master bedroom with a queen bed and en-suite bathroom that’s on its own floor—perfect for a couple wanting honeymoon-style seclusion. Together, the 3 bedrooms can accommodate up to 6 friends or family members. A holiday at Karamata means you’re a 10-minute walk or less than a 10-minute drive from all the attractions of Queenstown, whether that means shops, restaurants, the lovely Queenstown Gardens, or the headquarters of Remarkable Golf Tours. Don’t miss the thrills at Skyline Queenstown, a 5-minute drive from the villa, where you can board a gondola for a trip up a mountain, then pilot a luge back down. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Waves sweep a stretch of untouched sand in front of this half-rustic, half-modern designer villa in the Bay of Islands. Wood-paneled floors and ceilings envelop the great room for a cozy vibe, while glass walls offer up ocean views. The 2-minute walk to the beach means you can start the day with a meditative wade and finish with a glass of wine sipped with your toes in the sand. Though the location of this vacation rental is private enough to feel like your own deserted island in New Zealand, the villa is ready to pamper with al-fresco living and dining areas, a gas barbecue, and, inside, a smart TV, Wi-Fi, and a fireplace. A Nespresso machine and baby equipment will please family members of all ages. This luxury lodge is laid out in two sections, each with a gently sloping roof and fold-away glass walls. The wood paneling on the ceiling and floors means sunlight casts a golden glow across the open-concept living room, a dining table for 12, and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar. Otaha Beachfront Lodge has 2 master suites with king beds and ocean views, 2 bedrooms with 2 twin beds each, and one bedroom with a queen bed. All 5 bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms. Like the great room, the bedrooms get a serene yet stylish vibe from botanical-print wallpaper, geometric-print area rugs and honey-toned wood floors. From the lodge’s snug spot nestled between 2 hills, a honeymoon from the everyday, it’s a 2-minute walk to surfing on the beach or hiking the trails that wind up and down the landscape. Make a short drive to stand in the mist of Rainbow Falls or learn about the region’s past at the Whangaroa County Museum. And do stop for seafood during your holiday; the town of Kaeo was named for the mussels found in the area’s rivers. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: In the Canggu district of southern Bali where humble farmers can be found tending their rice paddies, the three-bedroom luxury estate Villa Levi lies peacefully under an enormous tree ready to host groups of up to six epicurean travelers. The villa is comprised of pavilions centered around a vast grassy terrace and large swimming pool. Fully staffed with stalwart professionals and wanting for nothing by way of amenities, picking Villa Levi could not be an easier choice for your dream Indonesian vacation.This villa has it all with a multitude of flat-screen televisions connected to the latest sound systems. The home has both air conditioning and Wi-Fi throughout to keep guests both cool and connected. Staying in shape is tough, though the villa’s on-site gym makes it a little easier, along with the spa for relaxing afterward. Outdoors, guests will find a large swimming pool adjacent to an inviting lounge area, though there are also two other terraces to lounge around in, one on the roof and one riverside.The villa successfully integrates avant-garde style and earthy elements affording guests the opportunity to live in style while never forgetting the raw beauty of nature that surrounds them. Timber and local stone feature prominently throughout the home and the rooms are replete with colorful Indonesian artworks and mysterious antiques, which engender an appreciation for the local culture. The kitchen comes fully equipped with the latest in appliances and an experienced chef.To describe the guest accommodations found at Villa Levi as luxurious would be an understatement. The bedrooms boast individual climate control, sitting areas, dressing rooms, televisions and DVD players, security safes and even mini-bars. Two of the three rooms each have romantic king size canopy beds, and the remaining room offers two twin beds. Additionally, the bedrooms have direct access to the gardens or a balcony.Bali is full of adventure and new experiences for all, starting with Echo Beach where one can catch dazzling sunsets while enjoying an Es Kelapa Muda, a yummy chilled green coconut. The bright lights of nearby Seminyak attract largely upscale clientele to partake in the lively nightlife and dine in its gourmet restaurants. For those few who appreciate culture, there’s no shortage of art galleries in Seminyak, which showcases both traditional and contemporary Balinese pieces.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Modern, angular architecture stands out against an endless sky at this laid-back, waterfront property. The resort-style villa is located on the Mornington Peninsula and features glittering water views from each room. Dense shrubbery has been planted along the perimeter to give a natural sense of privacy. Enjoy the fresh ocean air from your private jetty where you can also keep various water toys.The ultra contemporary interior features metallic accents, polished hardwood floors, and expansive glass walls. Floor-to-ceiling white lacquer cabinets create a clean, minimal appearance in the open-concept kitchen. Secure your spot on the patio’s plump wicker couch and bronze under the golden rays. Sliding doors open onto the deck and alfresco dining area, allowing the living space to seamlessly flow together. Safety Beach, in Melbourne’s bayside suburb, is known for its picturesque coves and stretching shorelines. Head out for a scenic drive along the coast, visit a vineyard, peruse local markets, or cycle along a seaside bike trail. Manicured landscaping at Crown Cove provides a verdant backdrop for afternoon happy hour on the tucked away terrace. The cinema room is a great spot to relax with a favourite family film after a long day of exploring—just don’t forget the popcorn. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: All bookings with travel dates taking place after January 1st 2019, will be subject to a 4.712% General Excise Tax & a 10.25% Transient Accommodations Tax. All additional fees & all other service-related costs, will be subject to the taxes above.With sunset views over the Pacific, lush landscaping and a beautiful course-side setting, Kaunaoa Halia 10B makes the postcards come to life. Not only does the private four-bedroom villa enchant with elegant tropical style, but guests have access to the exclusive country club facilities at Mauna Kea Resort. It’s just a short walk from the villa to two of Hawaii’s best beaches, and golfers won’t be able to resist playing both the Mauna Kea course and the private Weiskopf Par 3 course.The townhouse-style villa opens to a private backyard with views of the Mauna Kea golf course and, from the second-floor balcony, views of the ocean. A covered lanai has both sitting and dining areas, as well as a gas barbecue, and beyond, there’s an inviting lawn with chaise longues, pool and hot tub. During your stay, you’ll enjoy access to the amenities at the Kauna’oa complex, including pools, a fitness center, spa, golf course and lounges and cabanas. Don’t miss the perks at the Mauna Kea Resort, either, from the oceanfront pools, fitness centers and preferred parking to reduced rates at the golf course and tennis club.The luxe interiors at Kaunaoa Halia 10B will quickly make you feel at ease, with refined finishes and spacious layouts. A pair of matching sofas in the living room, bookended by two armchairs, means there’s plenty of room for the whole family, while sculptural wall art and bright throw pillows add whimsy and color. The fully equipped kitchen welcomes cooks with rich mahogany floors and gourmet Viking appliances and accommodates non-cooks with seating at a breakfast bar and in two leather club chairs.Each of the villa’s four bedrooms has an en-suite bathroom and flat-screen television. The master suite has a king bed and spa-worthy outdoor shower, and there’s a second bedroom with a king bed as well. The other bedrooms have a queen bed and two twin beds, respectively. Many of the bedrooms open to lanais or balconies, so you can begin your day by stepping out to feel the island breeze or fall asleep to the sound of the ocean in the distance.From the villa, you can walk or drive to Hapuna Beach and Mauna Kea Beach, both 5 minutes or less by car—and some of the island’s best beaches. It’s a 15-minute walk to the golf course, shopping and dining at Mauna Kea Resort and a 6-minute drive to even more shopping and dining options at Hapuna Prince Resort. See more of the island by driving to Mauna Lani, 15 minutes away, Waimea, 13 miles away, or Waikoloa, about 15 miles away. At the end of your stay, plan to fly out of Kona International Airport, 27 miles away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.HAWAII TAX ID #: TA-147-110-9120-01

listing.listing_description: Villa Florimar is a stunning private home near Seminyak on the island of Bali, situated within easy walking distance of Seseh Beach. The villa balances exquisite contemporary comforts with a vintage Balinese elegance, consisting of multiple open-air pavilions set amid lush, tropical gardens. Superb amenities include an infinity swimming pool, gourmet kitchen, beautiful living and dining areas, and excellent media features. Five king bedroom suites (including two in separate guest pavilions) accommodate ten travelers in total comfort—ideal for families, destination wedding guests, corporate retreats, or large groups of friends. Your vacation rental includes complimentary chef, butler, security, and housekeeping services.The estate forms an expansive, cloistered setting by the sea, with ample room for ceremonies, celebrations, or peaceful relaxation. Dip into the gem-toned pool and sip cool drinks under elegant parasols. Luxuriate on the fabulous sectional lounge bed, or relax over games in a poolside pavilion. Gather for home-cooked feasts at the open-air table, and linger outdoors amid the enchanting lighting, sipping glasses of wine under the starry sky.Open walls create a graceful flow of space and air between the pavilions and yard, infusing every moment with the breath of the gardens and sea. The cavernous main pavilion features soaring, vaulted ceilings, floors of polished black stone, and sumptuous furniture overlooking the pool. A lovely stepping stone path leads across a pond to the dining pavilion. The villa is equipped with Wi-Fi, cable TV, and a Sonos sound system, and the kitchen features professional-grade appliances for your private chef.There are three suites in the main house and two located in individual pavilions. All feature air conditioning, safes, and ensuite bathrooms, four of which include soaking tubs. Both the master suite and primary guest suite enjoy beautiful sea views, and the master includes a private lounge. The guest pavilions feature superb, open-concept bathrooms and private terraces.Villa Florimar balances exquisite privacy with convenient access to some of the finest destinations in Bali. In addition to Seseh Beach, you’re within easy reach of Echo Beach, Tanah Lot Temple, Nirwana Bali Golf Club, and the famed beaches and nightlife of Seminyak.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Watch the days unfold across Lake Wakatipu and The Remarkables from Views on Edinburgh. Built with living areas on the top floor, this modern retreat is designed to make the most of its views over some of New Zealand’s most spectacular scenery. No matter what time of year you visit, its proximity to central Queenstown puts you within easy reach of a range of activities, from golf to skiing. On sunny days, watch boats ply the lake from a lounger on the terrace, then serve lunch from the barbecue at the al-fresco table. On cooler evenings, pour a glass of local wine to sip as you soak in the outdoor hot tub or reconnect with friends and family indoors around the ping-pong table, satellite TV and integrated sound system. A glass wall brings the dramatic sight of the lake and mountains into the open-concept living room, dining room and fully equipped kitchen. A nearly all-white color scheme makes the space feel that much larger, and modern furnishings from a swing chair to industrial stools are stylish yet inviting places to perch. This luxury property has 3 bedrooms with king beds, private en-suite bathrooms and lake views, including a top-floor master suite with its own honeymoon-suite-worthy balcony facing the water. The fourth bedroom has two twin beds and access to a hall bathroom, along with its own views of the lake and mountains. A stay at this vacation rental could be a quiet week of relaxation or an adventure holiday—it’s up to you. Views on Edinburgh is less than a 10-minute drive from the shops and restaurants of downtown Queenstown and tranquil Queenstown Gardens on the waterfront, as well as more thrilling attractions like Skyline Queenstown, where you can ride a gondola up the mountain and luge back down. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Sunshine and shade are at play in the partly covered courtyard and pared-down interiors of this contemporary home 1 minute from Sunrise Beach. Wood panels arch over the al-fresco lounge to create a respite from the sun, and louvered windows filter light as it streams onto honey-toned wood floors. Pick up coffee from trendy Hastings Street for a dawn stroll along the golden sand of Sunrise Beach. Spend sunny days splashing in the villa’s pool, playing on the trampoline, napping in the shaded sitting area, and tossing dinner on the barbecue to enjoy at the al-fresco dining table for six—preferably paired with an Australian bottle from the wine fridge inside. The high-tech entertainment includes a streaming TV and Wi-Fi, but there are also guitars and a library of books, games, and movies for simpler pleasures. The glass wall between great room and terrace folds away, giving you the luxury of one seamless indoor-outdoor living space. A cloud-like tufted sectional sets a playful tone in the living area, and there’s seating for eight around the dining table. A fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar at the other end of the room opens to yet another outdoor space. This vacation rental has one master bedroom with a king bed, private en-suite bathroom, and views of a nature reserve. The other two bedrooms each have a queen bed and share access to a hall bathroom. It’s a 1-minute drive or 7-minute walk from this holiday home to Sunrise Beach, whose golden shores are almost entirely surrounded by national-park land teeming with palms and koalas. And it’s a 7-minute drive to family-friendly Noosa Main Beach and Hastings Street, lined with cafés serving excellent coffee and restaurants serving honeymoon-worthy fare. Nature lovers will want to explore Noosa National Park while avid players tee off at two nearby golf courses. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Hamsa is a beautiful four-bedroom villa on the south shore of Bali's Bukit peninsula. Nestled on high ground above the water's edge, the villa enjoys panoramic views of the Indian Ocean from its master bedroom and pool terrace. Blending contemporary and traditional styles, the villa offers a unique interpretation of Balinese luxury, enhanced by outstanding chef services, security, and a villa manager. Sharing an ample estate with neighboring Villa Soham, the two villas can be rented individually or together for large family reunions or destination wedding guests.An exquisite swimming pool runs along the ample terrace between the master suite and main interior, inviting you to plunge into its refreshing waters and sunbathe on loungers facing the horizon, while an alfresco dining table welcomes delicious meals in the shade of a rustic pergola. Glass doors open from the veranda to the cool interior, where vaulted wood ceilings shelter a sumptuous lounge and dining area. Glass walls flood the space with brilliant daylight and sunset hues, while a pendant halo casts an enchanting luminosity over nighttime feasts.The secluded master suite enjoys expansive ocean views from its king-size bed and private balcony, and its ensuite bathroom includes an alfresco shower and soaking tub. The three guest suites all feature king beds that can be converted into two twin-size beds. Air conditioning, ceiling fans, TVs, and ensuite bathrooms in every suite ensure privacy and comfort for all guests.While Villa Hamsa's extreme southern location offers unparalleled views and delicious seclusion, it's also within minutes of some of Bali's top attractions. Drive a few minutes to the beaches at Pandaw, Nusa Dua, and Jimbaran, or play an unforgettable round at nearby New Kuta Golf. Travel about fourteen kilometers to Uluwata Sea Temple or the resort and watersport destination Tanjung Benoa. Ngurah Rai International Airport is less than eighteen kilometers away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Sapphire Seas is the ultimate Maui getaway where sand meets sea, indoor meets outdoor and tasteful meets traditional. The beautiful four-bedroom villa sits up against a stretch of golden sand in Maui’s Kihei region, known for its authentic take on Hawaiian life.An immense free-form pool anchors the lovely tiled terrace displaying a stunning vista through majestic palm trees to the sparkling blue Pacific Ocean. Rattan deck chairs line the pool, allowing you to enjoy the warm island sun. The home is perfect for entertaining, as a spacious lanai houses a wet bar, barbecue and an elegant alfresco dining table that seats eight. As the sun begins to set, light the tiki torches and move your guests out onto the carefully manicured lawn for cocktails. Ease into the bubbling hot tub and relax under the stars.Retractable walls blur the lines between inside and out, as fresh air and light spill into the great room. Traditional materials blend with modern design in this open-plan room where you can look up and discover tropical woven matting decorating the ceiling or marvel at the refined furnishings made from native woods. The plush sofas, adorned with floral cushions surround a large flatscreen TV and tasteful coffee table. You’ll get to test your culinary skills in an incredible gourmet kitchen, overflowing with chef appointed appliances and accessories.A staircase, decorated with beautiful carved railings, leads you up the the spacious Master suite. There you’ll find a king size bed, walk-in closet and a huge veranda with seating and an ocean view. Its large ensuite bathroom contains fixtures that would rival any spa, including a jetted tub and dual-head shower. The other three individually styled bedrooms are on the ground floor, each with its own ensuite. All bedrooms are air conditioned and feature state-of-the-art entertainment systems.Kihei is bordered by 6 miles of beachfront, many of which are reef-protected making them ideal for swimming and snorkeling. You’ll be within walking distance of shops, restaurants and a grocery stores. Golfers are minutes from the Maui Nui Golf course while nature lovers can tour the wonders of Maui flora and fauna. Enjoy a drive up the winding road to Haleakala, a dormant volcano, where you can experience an unforgettable sunrise or sunset.Copyright © 2014 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Permit ID: STKM 2013/1007HAWAII TAX ID #: TA-122-672-3328-01

listing.listing_description: This splendid four-bedroom villa occupies a gorgeous two-hectare estate, which flows down a terraced hillside in the rural hinterland of southwest Bali. The Arsana Estate provides the perfect setting for weddings, events and spiritual retreats, or quite simply for families or groups looking for a close-to-nature playground in which to relax away from the hustle and bustle of Bali’s more crowded tourist centre. At this very self-contained villa there is no real need to venture out at all, but a visit to the nearby village – one of the prettiest in Bali – or a bicycle ride along the tiny roads, past farmers tending their rice fields, should not be missed.Arsana Estate is located about 11 km from the white sandy Echo beach in the district of Canggu, just a ten-minute drive from the greater Kuta/Seminyak area where the prime dining, shopping, and nightlife in Bali are located. Because of its slightly out of town setting, it has the double attraction of being relatively close to everything one might need, while being far enough away to retain a peaceful rural feel.Complementing its heritage-themed architecture, Arsana Estate’s large open-sided, fan-cooled living pavilion is embellished with fascinating oriental antiques and tribal artefacts. This is a comfortable space for family and friends to socialize on the casual rattan lounge seating or gather at the three-meter long dining table.Each bedroom is air-conditioned with an ensuite bathroom. The floor and ceiling of the bedrooms are of unique polished ironwood, and each bedroom has a patio overlooking the tropical gardens of the property.The Arsana Estate blends its exceptional location with outstanding facilities, including swimming pools, a games room, fully stocked bars and dedicated massage areas. These are complemented by top levels of service from an exceptional team of staff headed by a knowledgeable villa manager and including an experienced, talented chef and a driver. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Let all your cares melt away as you spend vacation day after vacation day at this luxury beachfront estate—it’s one of our favorite villas in Bali, and offers spectacular views of the ocean. Many consider the island of Bali to be paradise on Earth, thanks to its beautiful landscape, sandy beaches and unique culture.There are plenty of amenities on this property to indulge in. Relax on a cushioned chaise lounge by the swimming pool during the day, while at night you can soothe aching muscles in the jacuzzi. The view from the back terrace features panoramic views of palm trees swaying in front of softly rolling ocean waves. Meanwhile, inside there’s a home theater complete with a games room, pool table and a built-in bar. Guests here can also enjoy the use of a tennis court and relaxation pavilions, as well as the services of a chef, housekeeper and security guard.With accommodations spread across a series of pavilions, the main pavilion includes an open-air living room that overlooks the landscaped backyard and ocean. Inside, it features neutral colored modern furnishings, wood accents, and a wide, vaulted ceiling. There’s also a spacious kitchen with a breakfast bar that comes fully equipped with stainless steel appliances.This estate’s five bedrooms can comfortably sleep up to 10 guests. All rooms include en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning, televisions and DVD players, while the two master suites boast walk-in closets. Most of the rooms also offer king size beds, with one suite’s two twins able to convert into a king.The rugged, black sands of Cemagi Beach are just steps away from the villa, meanwhile, avid golfers can be at the nearest course—Nirwana—in just 9 km. Those looking to do some shopping can wander through the high-end boutiques at Seminyak, a 16 km journey from the home.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Slip into the unhurried pace of life in rural Bali at Villa Shinta Dewi. Set on a private lot outside Tegallantang, a quiet village just minutes from livelier Ubud, this four-bedroom contemporary vacation rental is surrounded by lush forest. Let the attentive staff take care of your needs as you relax with friends and family in an ambience of thoughtful modern luxury.It’s tempting to remain at the villa to stretch out on a lounger in the sun, swim in the heated pool or sip a drink in the shade of the pavilion. A barbecue and al-fresco dining area make it easy to whip up a casual dinner, and a home gym and massage room help you keep up with your routine.Furnished and frequented by the owners, the villa is thoughtfully appointed with stylish pieces in luxe finishes. The great room, which stretches across the front of the house, can be opened to the pool terrace; together with the primarily white color scheme, it gives the space a bright, airy feel. Soft sectionals in the sitting area are set off by orange accents and a relief on the feature wall, while in the dining area, the solid wood table has heft. The chef’s kitchen is fully equipped with everything from champagne flutes to martini glasses.Each of the four bedrooms at Villa Shinta Dewi has an en-suite bathroom and opens to a terrace or shared balcony. The master suite has a king bed and jetted tub, two bedrooms have two twin beds (which can be converted to king beds) and one bedroom has a queen bed. As in the great room, sunlight spills into the bedrooms through large wood-framed windows and sliding doors for a warm, inviting atmosphere.Though the villa is meant to be an escape to a quiet area where rice farmers work and traditional temples dot the roads, it’s not far from the livelier parts of Seminyak. You’ll find more and more local businesses, from cafés to batik studios, opening in the neighborhood, and for an array of shopping, dining and nightlife options, make the short drive to central Ubud, popular with everyone from backpackers to couples on honeymoon. For a one-of-a-kind excursion, drive to the nearby Taro Elephant Safari Park or Bali Bird Park.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Find both inner and outer peace, Bali style, at Abaca Villa Iluh. Though it’s hidden among lush rice fields, it’s close to beaches, temples, shopping, dining and more around Seminyak. The villa’s six bedrooms can welcome up to twelve guests in laid-back luxury, but it can be reserved with the two neighboring Abaca villas for parties of up to 32 friends or extended family.Your holiday at Villa Iluh includes the services of a villa manager and housekeeper, as well as a choice of American or Asian breakfast each day. Savor the warm weather from a courtyard with a swimming pool and plenty of loungers, and request a gas barbecue if you’d like to do some al-fresco cooking as well. For your evening entertainment, the villa has cable TV, Wi-Fi and a wine fridge.The villa’s open-sided living and dining areas frame views of the scenery and encourage flow between the indoor and outdoor spaces. Vaulted ceilings covered in woven panels, wicker furnishings and stone floors lend natural texture and relaxed style, and the art collection is an eclectic mix. The villa also has a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar for your lunch and dinner preparations.Villa Iluh has three bedrooms with king beds, two bedrooms with queen beds and one bedroom with two twin beds. All six bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning, and open to either a private balcony or the pool area.Though it’s designed to feel secluded, this vacation rental is just a short drive from some of Bali’s must-sees. It’s an easy trip to several beaches and temples, kid-favorite Waterbom Bali Waterslides and grown-up-favorite Nirwana Bali Golf Course by Greg Norman. Join the honeymooners and families alike flocking to Seminyak Square for boutiques, spas and a range of great eateries.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Water and mountain views provide a serene backdrop from the exquisite contemporary kitchen, dining space and lounge. Solid walnut timber features carry through from the kitchen to the separate media room, a lovely spot to retreat to for movie nights or the big game.Outdoor entertaining can be enjoyed year-round in a range of well-designed alfresco spaces. An outdoor schist fireplace takes the edge off brisk nights and the lake facing hot tub with built-in speakers & an uninterrupted view can promise fabulous social moments. The house has two separate bedrooms wings. All but the prized room include a queen bed. The luxurious master bedroom comes with a king bed, walk in wardrobe, TV and an ensuite with a large bath tub facing the lake views.The exclusive properties in the area also have use of the communal swimming pool, spa, tennis court and gym. It is a short 2.6km walk into the town centre or a 4 minute drive.

listing.listing_description: Experience true luxury, Bali style, at Windu Sari. Though it’s separated from the bustle by a gated estate, this stylish vacation rental is close to beautiful beaches, trendy restaurants and clubs, and shopping in fashionable Petitenget. Reserve its four bedrooms for an indulgent holiday overseen by the villa’s full staff, or book it as part of the larger Windu Estate to celebrate a special occasion with friends and family.A lush garden forms the private setting for this tropical haven. The courtyard features a 14-meter pool, loungers in the sun, a poolside bale, al-fresco dining and a barbecue, while inside, the villa’s amenities range from a media room and fitness area to satellite television and Wi-Fi. Your stay at Windu Sari also includes the services of a chef, housekeeper, butler and nighttime guard.Inspired by traditional Balinese architecture, the villa takes indoor-outdoor living to new levels with its lofty ceilings, open layout and louvered doors. Wood beams and accents lend warmth to the sitting and dining areas, and polished marble floors extend from the terrace indoors for a seamless feel. The fully equipped kitchen is a state-of-the-art showpiece with sleek cabinetry and a convenient central island.Windu Sari has two bedrooms with king beds and two bedrooms with two twin beds each; all four bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and open to balconies. Teak floors, clean-lined furnishings and exuberantly patterned textiles give each bedroom suite a distinctive flair.From the villa, it’s less than a 10-minute walk to the restaurants and boutiques lining Jalan Petitenget or the white sands of Legian Beach. You can take a honeymoon-worthy stroll all the way from Kuta to Canggu on the nearby Petitenget Beach—or stop along the way for a cocktail at one of the oceanfront bars. Make the short drive to Seminyak Square for a relaxing day at your choice of several spas or a lively night out in its famous clubs.Windu Sari can be rented as part of a larger estate, Windu Estate (https://www.luxuryretreats.com/vacation-rentals/indonesia/bali/petitenget/windu-estate-114865). Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Adasa offers traditional Balinese construction, with open concept balés, or pavilions, that allow one to constantly appreciate the verdant and tropical setting. Near the island’s southwestern coast in a central location known as Petitenget, the villa’s three guest bedrooms can accommodate a total of six individuals. Come to Bali, Indonesia’s premier vacation destination and stay at Villa Adasa for the experience of a lifetime.Guests staying here will be attended to by the villa’s four butlers who work alongside the chef, housekeeper, security guard and gardener. Villa Adasa has a fourteen foot greenstone-tiled swimming pool and a traditional balé furnished with large daybeds perfect for those precious idle moments. The home has been upgraded to include the latest in entertainment technology, including an elite Sonos sound system and Wi-Fi. The decked roof above is perfect for either sunbathing, yoga or casual hangouts.The interior decor of Villa Adasa is a feast for the eyes, consisting of colorful Batik cushions, ornate Turkish rugs and monochromatic prints dated from the 1930s. The vaulted ceilings here are either thatched with alang-alang grass in the traditional Balinese style or elegant ironwood shingles, while the walls are made of attractive Palimanan stone and the flooring consists of either terrazzo or teakwood. Additionally, the kitchen comes fully-equipped and features an inviting and large breakfast bar.Three bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms will give guests a luxurious and comfy spot in which to rest and unwind in total privacy. The master suite is located on the second floor and boasts a king size bed in addition to an amply sized sitting area, wall-length wardrobes, mountain view and balcony access. The two bedrooms on the ground floor each have two twin beds, a dressing area and direct access to the terrace.If you’ve come to Bali to enrich your soul and have fun, then you’re in luck because Villa Adasa is near almost all of Bali’s top attractions. Petitenget Beach is just a stone’s throw away and has ideal waves for surfing. If surfing doesn’t cut it, then try Waterbom Bali, the island’s fun water park that provides a cool refreshing splash for children of all ages. For a taste of the local fare, the so-called ‘Eat Street’ found in nearby Jalan Laksmana will delight your taste buds and satiate your appetite.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Lulito is an elegant colonial retreat located at the pulsing heart of chic Seminyak just moments away from Petitenget beach on Bali’s sunset coast. This fully staffed villa sets a stylish tone as a tropical getaway for families or groups. Four white plantation-style pavilions border a 15-metre azure pool that forms an outstanding centrepiece for a small soiree. The two-level sleeping pavilion houses four luxurious bedrooms while three sleek open living areas provide a collection of zones to chill, engage or play. Chose between formal feasts in the smart dining area or casual alfresco meals at the dining table nestled within the villa’s lush gardens.As you approach Villa Lulito via the sophisticated shopping and dining enclave of Oberoi, rubbing shoulders with iconic Bali landmarks including the super-cool Ku De Ta and the elegant hotel after which the area is named, it is obvious that the villa can lay claim to an exclusive and coveted location. And once beyond the threshold of this luxurious villa oasis, Australian interior designer Stuart Membery’s tribute to Ralph Lauren’s polished Caribbean style is also pleasingly obvious: everything from the beautifully hand-rendered walls along the drive and the majestic custom-made Aegean blue doorway, to the soft-cushioned rattan chairs, white shutters and maritime motifs coupled with exposed timber beam ceilings and hurricane lamps, evokes refined empire. Think Montego Bay meets Bali.Families, couples or friends will adore soaking up the charm of this 2011-built residence, which has four generous ensuite bedrooms, including a delightful kids room with four bunks and the option to add another king-size bed (extra charge), and plenty of living space. Two bedrooms flank the villa’s double entranceway and face the pool, while above them two more suites open onto a long balcony overlooking the azure water, which is lit at night by neon blue lights creating a mesmerising aquatic art piece. Relax into one of several comfortable living rooms that meander through the pavilions and include a quiet alcove with plush sofas for watching television, perusing the library, listening to music or enjoying an aperitif. Landscape gardener Bruce Johnson created a kaleidoscope of tropical gardens that fringe the pavilions.A two-storey pavilion houses all four ensuite, air-conditioned and fan-cooled bedrooms at Villa Lulito – two at pool level and two on the floor above, accessed from a long, white, covered balcony. Plantation shutters, rattan trunks and lush potted palms create a serene environment that is perfect for holiday downtime. The Master suite can easily convert to a family suite by sliding open the double doors in the dressing area to connect with the adjacent children’s room.A dedicated staff team provides five-star service and expertly prepare gourmet delights to be served in one of three dining areas from casual in the gleaming kitchen to a timelessly set table for eight in the formal dining room. Everything is at your fingertips, including massage beds that are just waiting for a therapist to be called to deliver expert treatments.Step outside and you are at the centre of Bali’s best shopping district, with hip cafes, fabulous nightclubs and fine restaurants to chose from. One of the island’s most important Hindu temples and glorious Seminyak beach are just a stroll away. Breathe in the sea air and get your holiday rocking from this perfectly placed villa.

listing.listing_description: Please note: This home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.Contemporary style meets stunning classic views of the Remarkables at Aspen House. Floor-to-ceiling, wall-to-wall windows put the peaks and Lake Wakatipu on display, while Queenstown glitters below. This spacious four-bedroom vacation rental is wonderful year-round, whether for a golf getaway with friends in the New Zealand summer or a ski break with family in the winter. And for even more excursions and activities, just ask the 24-hour concierge that’s included in your holiday here.This luxury property pairs big views with a quiet, private location. Revel in the South Island scenery from the expansive terrace, where a sitting area, barbecue, al-fresco fireplace and hot tub invite you to make an evening of it. Inside, entertain by the wet bar or relax in the media room, catch a favorite show or important game on Sky TV, set the mood with the sound system, rejuvenate both body and spirit in the sauna or cozy up to the fireplace.An open layout around a central great room means the views from Aspen House are on display in the living area, dining area and fully equipped kitchen. The sleek, window-lined rooms are warmed by natural textures of stone, leather and wood, from the fireplace surround and lounge chairs to the farmhouse-inspired dining table. A bar area separate from the kitchen and a convenient-and-chic island make it easy for guests to mingle.Each of the villa’s bedrooms is its own retreat with an en-suite bathroom, private balcony and plenty of those views over the lake and mountains. There are three bedrooms with king beds, including the master suite, and one with a queen bed.With its dramatic landscape and vibrant scene, the Queenstown area has plenty to offer to travelers from thrill-seekers to families to honeymooners, and your concierge is more than happy to help you find the perfect day trip or outdoor adventure. Test your skill on the golf course during the summer or on the ski slopes during the winter. Try your luck at Skycity Casino, or just enjoy a night out discovering Queenstown’s shopping and dining.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
