listing.listing_description: Modern style and a gorgeous natural setting are a perfect marriage at Noku Beach House. Hidden away in a walled garden and serviced by an attentive staff, this rare beachfront Seminyak vacation rental is an oasis of true luxury. It’s an incredible retreat for groups of up to twelve—or a stunning setting for a family reunion or Bali destination wedding.Your holiday at the beach house includes the services of a chef, butler, housekeeper and groundskeeper, as well as security staff. Spend your time lounging in the sun on the terrace, splashing in a 27-meter-long pool that stretches toward the horizon or napping in the shade of the balé. Rinse off in the outdoor shower before sitting down at the al-fresco table or wandering inside to enjoy the media room, wet bar and Wi-Fi.While the villa’s architecture frames the breathtaking Indian Ocean views, equally picture-perfect interiors by Alex Zabotto-Bentley offer a fresh, contemporary take on the beach house. Stretch out on the sectional and set your cocktail on one of the chic and convenient low tables scattered in the living room, or gather in the sculptural armchairs around the dining table. Though chef service is included, there is a fully equipped kitchen.The honeymoon from everyday life continues in the villa’s six bedrooms. There are three with king beds and three with two twin beds each; all six have private en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning and ceiling fans, and open to a balcony or patio.A stay at Noku Beach House puts you right on Seminyak Beach, just a short drive from several popular restaurants and resorts, and a quick trip from the lively town of Kuta. Don’t miss the chance to explore the town of Canggu or the impressive Uluwatu Temple on the sea.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note that this property has an open plan and privacy between bedrooms may be limited. The downstairs bedroom is separated from the living area by an electric privacy curtain. The upstairs bedroom is a loft style room which overlooks the living area. Please speak with your Villa Specialist for more detail. Circle the wrap-around terrace to find the perfect shady spot to sip your morning Espresso while gazing out of forested landscape leading down to Whangagora Harbour at this open concept home in New Zealand. Backyard barbeques, late nights in the hot tub, and alfresco dinners all benefit from the amazing view. After you explore the private trails on-site, head to 90 Mile Beach for a moonlit stroll. Open the doors to the terrace and let the warm sun and fresh breeze set a calming tone throughout. The open nature of the villa adds an extra social-element to the space, making it easy to stay part of the conversation even while prepping dinner or relaxing outside. Contemporary furnishings mix with rugged wood and stone features to create an atmosphere that is quintessential New Zealand. After dinner, get a fire going, grab a beer, and search the satellite television for some rugby or football. After the game, turn up the sound system, open the terrace doors, and settle in for a late night with good friends. In the morning, get up early and treat everyone to some bacon and eggs at the kitchen’s breakfast bar. After a morning round at Kauri Cliffs, a PGA Tour stop, treat yourself to lunch in the Bay of Islands, one of the areas nightlife and entertainment hubs. If you’d rather catch your own meal, head to Whangoroa Harbour and book a private fishing charter. New Zealand is a prime spot for Blue and Striped Marlin. Then, check out Ake Ake Vineyard to sample some of the best local wine. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Ambra is a marvelous, beachfront villa on the southwest shore of Bali. Situated within Pantai Lima Estates—an enclave of five extraordinary homes—the villa's prime location places you within easy reach of both Canguu and Seminyak, while offering a rare degree of privacy and extraordinary ocean views. Five bedroom suites accommodate ten guests, making it an ideal vacation rental for families and groups of friends. Complimentary features include chef service, security, housekeeping, a property manager, and two five-seater cars with drivers.The villa's outdoor living areas are nestled amid lush, tropical gardens and trees with panoramic views of the coast and sea. Elegant loungers and a crescent-shaped table overlook the pool, while a half-moon lounge is perfectly placed for sunset cocktails. Enjoy quiet afternoons in the stand-alone pavilion with comfortable beds, or play games of pingpong on the shaded patio. Gather for alfresco meals at the lovely table perched above the beach, and crawl into the whirlpool spa at night for a soak beneath the stars.Beautiful French doors join the pool patio with the home's interiors, inviting fresh ocean breezes into the home. The classic Balinese villa features vaulted ceilings, spacious salon areas, and a gorgeous dining table of polished timber. There is a lovely library for quiet downtime, and a massage bale is set beside an extraordinary carved stone relief.The villa features four bedroom suites with king beds and one suite with a queen bed, and all have ensuite bathrooms. The master bathroom includes a soaking tub, and two of the guest bathrooms are semi-alfresco. Air conditioning, ceiling fans, safes, and TVs help create lovely private sanctuaries for downtime and rest.Villa Ambra boasts one of the finest locations in this region of southern Bali. Along with your private stretch of beach, you're within minutes of Echo Beach and the popular beach and nightlife hubs of Canggu and Seminyak. Golfers are less than ten kilometers from Nirwana Bali, and Tanah Lot Temple is also minutes away. Ngurah Rai International Airport is less than twenty kilometers away, making the villa a convenient choice for destination wedding guests.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: A fireplace crackles in the shadow of snow-capped mountains at this lodge-inspired contemporary home near Lake Wanaka. Charcoal-dark cedar cladding on the outside contrasts with the white marble countertops and pale hardwood floors inside. It’s a 6-minute drive through the lake-dotted landscape to food trucks serving up chicken and crepes and coffee shops pouring organic brews in Wanaka Town. Cross the lawn from the main house to an open-sided al-fresco pavilion with a sitting area tucked around a fireplace, a dining table for eight, and an outdoor kitchen with a wine fridge and gas barbecue. Watch the first stars appear over the peaks while soaking in the outdoor hot tub, or slip inside to watch the smart TV and challenge friends and family in the games room. Sloping rooflines and dramatic cedar panels conceal bright rooms with impressive mountain views through walls of glass. Timber ceilings get a bit of edge from massive steel beams that stretch across the open-concept living area, dining table for six, and a fully equipped kitchen with a splash of marble across its breakfast bar. This luxury property has one master bedroom with a king bed and en-suite bathroom. The other two bedrooms have a king bed and queen bed, respectively, and share a hall bathroom. Like the great room, the bedrooms use hardwood floors, timber ceilings, and neutral tones for a serene feel, and sliding glass doors open to the outdoors. While this vacation rental feels private, it’s less than a 10-minute drive from downtown Wanaka, where you’ll find everything from casual cafes and friendly pubs to honeymoon-worthy restaurants focusing on local fare. Save a day on your holiday schedule for a day trip to Mount Aspiring National Park, where you can get up close to the glaciers and waterfalls that make New Zealand so gorgeous. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This fabulous villa is located within the Champions Ridge enclave at Maua Lani Resort on Hawaii's Big Island. Built in a Polynesian style, the villa offers an extraordinary balance of lavish privacy and convenient access to the resort's world-class amenities. Its private outdoor areas and ample interiors feature high-end amenities for dining, entertainment, and relaxation (including a large home movie theater), and all six bedrooms feature king beds, making it an ideal choice for multiple couples, family reunions, or executive retreats.A lovely courtyard with koi pond graces front entrance, while the back terrace features the villa's namesake pool. Sweeping views of the golf course and lush coastline extend toward the Pacific horizon and majestic volcano peaks. The broad lanai provides a cool setting for lounging and dining in the ocean breeze, with a wet bar, grill, and dining table for six, and an elevated spa invites you to soothing soaks under the sun or stars.Wide accordion doors fuse the terrace with the interior, forming a 3000-square-foot space for entertaining guests or relaxing with loved-ones. The open kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances and abundant prep space, and serves multiple dining areas including a beautiful formal dining room for eight. A cavernous home theater seats fifteen for movie night.Four of the villa's king bedrooms feature ensuite bathrooms, while the other two share a bathroom between them. All of the bedrooms enjoy TVs, air conditioning, and ceiling fans, and several have walk-in closets. The master suite has both interior and alfresco showers, as well as a soaking tub, and there is an additional queen bed connected to the master bedroom's walk-in closet, which enjoys a private courtyard entrance.The Blue Lagoon has ample garage space and comes with a four-seater golf cart. In the immediate vicinity, the exclusive Champions Ridge community comprises 23.5 acres of private land and features Hawaii's first eighteen-hole putting course, just minutes from your door. Your vacation rental also includes access to the Mauna Lani Beach Club and (at extra cost) the resort's world-class spa, sports facilities, and two championship golf courses.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.HAWAII TAX ID #:TA-197-596-0576-01

listing.listing_description: Take yourself on holiday amid film-worthy scenery and magazine-worthy interiors at Kumanu. This modern vacation rental is stunning inside and out, with views of some of the South Island’s most incredible landscapes and beautifully appointed living spaces. Invite up to eight friends or family members to an idyllic setting that’s nevertheless only minutes from skiing, golf and lively central Queenstown.The amenities at this luxury property range from a media room with satellite television and a sound system to Wi-Fi, a piano and a wine fridge. Glass walls connect the interiors with outdoor spaces featuring areas for sitting, lounging and dining; a barbecue; a hot tub and even an al-fresco fireplace.Details such as an open-plan layout, wood floors and built-in bookcases give Kumanu a feeling of refined sophistication. Entertain with mountain views as the backdrop or unwind with a glass of New Zealand wine by the fireplace in the expansive living room, or stretch out with a book on the sectional in a separate sitting area. Follow the steps up to the dining area and adjacent fully equipped kitchen.Each of the villa’s four bedrooms has a king bed and private en-suite bathroom, and opens directly to the terrace. All but one of the beds can be converted to two twin beds if your party needs alternate accommodations. Like the main living areas, the bedrooms are filled with stylish contemporary pieces, from geometric area rugs and plush velour chairs to upholstered headboards.No matter what the season, Kumanu is close to a range of activities and entertainment. The villa is less than 48 km from the ski areas at The Remarkables and Coronet Peak, and less than 40 km from Queenstown Golf Course. Don’t miss the range of vibrant shops and restaurants in central Queenstown and, for a grown-up night out, try your luck at the casino or spend a honeymoon-worthy evening on a lake cruise.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Please enquire with one of our Villa Specialists for further details.Dine alfresco amid panoramic vistas of Sydney Harbour Bridge and the iconic Opera House at this contemporary, family-friendly villa in Mosman. Superbly equipped for cooking, dining, and relaxation, Principino (“Little Prince”) offers a cozy and stylish home-base while exploring the Northern Beaches and Australia’s finest city. Play in your private swimming pool or walk minutes to the sands of Dog Beach at Sirius Cove.The luminous, 3-level home features a main living/dining area on the upper level, bedrooms on the middle floor, and a pool terrace and yoga/play room on the lower floor. The upper level features an open-concept layout with gourmet kitchen and 2 dining areas (indoors and alfresco), with sensational views of the iconic Sydney skyline. These views are on full display in the master and primary guest rooms, too, which share a balcony between them. The ground floor features a beautiful open space with kitchenette that can serve as a rumpus room, yoga studio, or relaxation space. It opens to the outdoor swimming pool with kid-friendly protective fence.The villa’s prime location is just 2 minutes from Mosman Village and a short trip from several Northern Beaches, including Balmoral and Bondi. Extraordinary native wildlife is on view at Taronga Zoo, while Bungaree’s Walkway will lead you through the local bushland to Georges Head Battery. Just 5 kilometers away is the Sydney Harbour Bridge, your gateway to one of the world’s most exciting cities.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note: This home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist. Set high on Queenstown Hill, Villa de Luxe offers breathtaking views day and night, year-round. Nearly every room of this contemporary South Island vacation rental looks out over the glassy waters of Lake Wakatipu and the rugged peaks of The Remarkables. A central location makes it easy to spend a holiday with family and friends here, skiing or exploring lively Queenstown.Take in the fresh air from balconies facing the mountains or a private outdoor lounge area with a firepit and barbecue. Watch the stars come out from an al-fresco hot tub, perfectly positioned to give views of the lake, or watch a favorite show on the Sky TV. Other high-tech amenities include an iPod docking station, sound system, Wi-Fi and security system.Rendered in glass and metal, Villa de Luxe has a sleek, contemporary look. The living room, dining area and fully equipped kitchen in its open-plan great room are spacious enough for everyone to gather and enjoy the views, cozy up to the fireplace or prepare an après-ski feast. Refined furnishings by a top local interior designer make a stylish statement while still letting the views be the star.Each of the three bedrooms at this luxury property has an en-suite bathroom. There are two bedrooms with king beds, including a master suite with its own balcony and 180-degree views, and one bedroom with two twin beds.The location of Villa de Luxe in the Belfast Terrace area puts guests within walking distance of the shops, restaurants and nightlife of Queenstown, as well as attractions like the casino and gardens. Relive your honeymoon with a romantic cruise on a vintage steamship, or perfect your swing on one of two nearby golf courses. When it’s winter in New Zealand, the slopes of the Coronet Peak ski area are only 15 minutes from the villa.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Escape to the ultimate golfing hideaway in New Zealand’s unspoiled interior. Deftly incorporated into the rambling Kinloch estate golf course – designed by legend Jack Nicklaus – this listing provides direct access to this stunning lakeside course. Surrounded on all sides by pine forests and grasslands of the wild Taupo region, experience immersion in recreational bliss and natural splendor.Kinloch offers a warm welcome on the shores of Lake Taupo, the North Island’s greatest freshwater lake. With a commanding view of the fairway of this celebrated course, returning guests will pass into a regal stone courtyard, offering total privacy and ambience as a nearby firepit crackles. Choose to begin the day with breakfast on the viewpoint terrace, surrounded by birdsong as a gentle wind flows from the nearby forest, or curl up in the warm interior of the villa with a book and simply watch the weather pass. You’re never more than a short walk from an absorbing day activity; like spending an enriching day in Kinloch’s renowned solar spa, shaking things up with a lakeside mountain bike outing, or taking on a tennis match in the one of the estate’s complementary courses. From Kinloch, day-trip options range in every direction. Visit the vibrant nearby town of Taupo and enjoy the finest and freshest NZ cuisine at excellent local restaurants. Follow the Waikato river north, and wander amongst the steaming clouds of the Craters of the Moon geothermal walkways. Reforge a connection with the living environment via the naturally-heated pools of the Wairakei spa, one of New Zealand’s very finest outdoor day retreats, or simply take off for a drive amongst the hills and forests, ranging to the far side of Taupo as the splendor of 4 natural parks stretch for miles in every direction. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: A peaked roofline echoes the snow-capped peaks of the mountains at this modern lodge in Glenorchy. Tolkien fans might recognize the area as Middle-Earth; everyone else can spot the landscape in details like local-schist chimneys, cedar-planked walls, and timber floors. Hike the boardwalk to the breathtaking Glenorchy Lagoon and bring your camera to photographer-favorite Glenorchy Wharf.Make the most of the scenery in outdoor entertaining areas boasting a sunny terrace, a barbecue, and al-fresco dining for eight along with mountain and lake views. If you’ll be on holiday in cooler weather, the house features both gas and wood-burning fireplaces (plus heated floors), and a satellite TV, surround-sound system, and Wi-Fi.Walls of local wood and stone are just part of the clean-lined architecture of this vacation rental; the other part is glass, framing the views as you catch up with friends and family in the sitting area or perch at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen. It also lines the separate dining room for an al-fresco feel even when you’re indoors.This luxury property has two bedrooms with king beds, including a master suite; one bedroom with a queen bed; and one bedroom with two twin beds. All four bedrooms have private en-suite bathrooms. Each bedroom is in its own little pavilion laid out around a central courtyard, perfect for couples wanting honeymoon-style privacy.Wyuna House is set among some of the prettiest scenery in New Zealand—and luckily, it’s easy to get out an explore it. The villa is less than a 10-minute drive from popular hiking and photo spots like Lake Face Creek Falls, Glenorchy Lagoon, and Glenorchy Wharf. Climb Mount Alfred on your own, book a Lord of the Rings–themed tour to spot filming locations, or take a thrilling jet-boat ride on Lake Wakatipu.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Get the full Hawaii experience from the comfort of your lanai at Laule’a #6. The Pacific, the mountains, lava rock and, naturally, the golf course are all in view of this Big Island vacation rental. And although you can’t see it from the villa, the white-sand beach at the Mauna Lani Resort is just minutes away.Take in the scenery—and the sunshine—from the outdoor swimming pool, hot tub, lounging and dining areas, and an alfresco kitchen with a barbecue. After a day on the greens or the beach, pour a glass from the wine fridge, settle in by the TV or share highlights of your holiday with friends and family at home over Wi-Fi.Thanks to a slide-away glass wall separating the lanai from the great room, you can even enjoy the views from the living area, dining area and the fully equipped kitchen. This is the heart of the villa’s 2,800 square feet of living space, and its expansive feel is only enhanced by a vaulted, wood-paneled ceiling.There are three bedrooms in the main house of Laule’a #6 and one in a guest house; all four have private en-suite bathrooms. The main house has two bedrooms with king beds and one with two queen beds. The guest-house bedroom has a king bed, making it perfect for a couple wanting honeymoon-style privacy or in-laws seeking a little quiet.From the villa’s location in an enclave of luxury homes, it’s just a short drive to the restaurants, shops, racquet club and golf course at the Mauna Lani Resort, as well as the beach club. It’s also an easy trip to picturesque Pauoa Bay Beach, great for first-time snorkelers, and the unique lava-strewn stretch of Holoholokai Beach. To get the full flavor of the island, make the drive into Waimea or Kailua-Kona for shopping and dining.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.HAWAII TAX ID #:092-124-0064-01

listing.listing_description: If you’re looking for family-friendly luxury accommodations in beautiful Bali, look no further. Situated on top of Jimbaran Hill, a mere fifteen minute drive from the airport, Villa Jamalu has a unique vantage point that reveals the island’s stunning landscape like nowhere else. With four rooms and space for eight, the villa offers plenty of amenities to indulge in for both adults and children. Located near many of Bali’s most sought-after sites and the revered Mount Batukaru, it isn’t hard to see why Bali is the pride of Indonesia.Villa Jamalu has a comprehensive staff to aid guests in enjoying their time spent here, with a house manager, private chef and housekeeper. Family-friendly means that children will not be given second-billing here. The house contains a playroom full of books and toys as well as a media room with a plasma television and a PS3 gaming console. Additionally, the saltwater swimming pool and billiards table are intended for guests of all ages.The decor found at Villa Jamalu is contemporary and sleek, composed of leather furnishings, suar wood tables and abstract art. Dine on a grand and elegant dining table which can seat twelve, in a fun and sophisticated setting. The gourmet kitchen features a luxurious double fridge, a separate wine fridge and a coffee machine to brew delicious authentic java.The guest suites have been designed with stylish, contemporary furnishings and artworks that deliver a familiar sense of comfort. Each room has a queen size bed dressed in chic linens, iPod dock and en-suite bathrooms with charming designer fixtures. The master suite on the top floor has ocean views, whereas the master suite on the ground floor has a jetted tub and view of the pool.There’s so much to do in Bali, and guests staying at Villa Jamalu can partake in any and all of them at their whim. Try a horseback excursion through scenic trails or get your surf’s up, an activity that Bali is known for throughout the world. A twenty minute drive from the villa will bring you to Uluwatu Temple, which is one of the six holiest sanctuaries in the world according to the Balinese and is built on the edge of a cliff high above the sea.
